name: Stage Lights
description: A one page, simple minigame with mechanics for performances. Compatible with most dice-based TTRPGs, or can be used as a small standalone roleplaying experience. Draw on your toolbox to create a memorable experience for your audience. Numerological resolution creates a metric you can measure, but leaves room for interpretation. Requires three 4-sided dice, one 12-sided die, and something to take notes with.
